_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PELICAN PANEL
name: Shoutcast Server (x64)
author: legacyangel2k9@icloud.com
description: Shoutcast server for broadcasting media streams. Easy to deploy and use for online radio stations using Pelican Panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Shoutcast Installer for Pelican

apk update
apk add wget curl unzip zip tar

cd /mnt/server
mkdir -p sc

# Download latest Shoutcast release
echo "Downloading Shoutcast server..."
wget "http://download.nullsoft.com/shoutcast/tools/sc_serv2_linux_x64-latest.tar.gz"

# Extract files
echo "Extracting Shoutcast archive..."
tar -xzf sc_serv2_linux_x64-latest.tar.gz

# Download config file
wget "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Rezanans-wow/Shoutcast-server-egg/main/shoutcast_files/sc_serv_simple.conf"

# Cleanup
rm sc_serv2_linux_x64-latest.tar.gz

echo "Shoutcast installation complete."
